text: Due to the sheer annoyance of figuring out what to Google, I've decided to risk what any reputation I had to ask this rather simple question.
As PEP8 suggests keeping below the 80 column rule for your python program, how can I abide to that with long strings, i.e.

code: s = "this is my really, really, really, really, really, really, really long string that I'd like to shorten."

text: How would I go about expanding this to the following line, i.e.

code:
s = "this is my really, really, really, really, really, really" + 
    "really long string that I'd like to shorten."
